casebody.data:
ELAM, et al.
v.
WILLIAM DOUGLAS MANAGEMENT, INC., et al. No. 216P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 22, 2015. Kenneth T. Davies, for Elam, Amy Pharr, et al. M. Aaron Lay, Charlotte, for William Douglas Management, Inc. Lori Gilmore, for Charlotte House Association Of Unit Owners, Inc. Erik M. Rosenwood, Charlotte, for Elam, Amy Pharr, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of July 2015 by Plaintiffs for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of July 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
